title: Still no info on the SSW S4 World Championship skins??

replies.body: talon and thresh too, i forgot about the rest, i think like, kassadin and then rengar

Rengar for sure, it would be very stupid of Riot not to use Rengar for the SSW skin, not saying this because i main him i'm saying this because this is what Dandy is known for now, being one of the very few that has great success with Rengar in the competitive scene.
